resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS settings (_id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT, setting_name TEXT PRIMARY KEY, setting_value TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS my_cars (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, year INTEGER, make TEXT, model TEXT, trim TEXT, trim_id INTEGER, is_custom TEXT);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fill_ups (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, car_id INTEGER, date INTEGER, miles FLOAT, gallons FLOAT, price_per_gallon FLOAT, full_cost FLOAT, log_date INTEGER, KEY (log_date, car_id);
